title: [firefox] there is no alert when uploading a larger file than the storage account
body:
### expected behaviour
having the account storage set to 1 gb, if i select upload a file larger than 1gb an alert message has to be shown.

### actual behaviour
when i select upload the file larger than 1gb, the ff keeps loading.  

### steps to reproduce
1. log in the enterprise version
2. account storage set to 1 gb
3. select to upload a file larger than 1 gb

### server configuration
{"installed":"true","version":"5.0.7","versionstring":"5.0.6 rc","edition":"enterprise beta"} 
open suse 12.2 
sql lite

### client configuration
browser: ff  
safari and chrome does work

operating system:mac 10.8.3
